channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Drain is blocked - stagnant water, smells bad, 26th June
item.description:
The drain is outside 104 Fairview Road.

item.title: TMC - Defects - Other FW6 Surface problem, 26th June
item.description:
ENWD with give and take please place x4 2m barriers plus x8 sandbags around footway depression 8000x1000mm (FW6 Rutting&Depressions)
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Builders blocking disabled bay, 26th June
item.description:
I'm concerned to see the disabled parking bay is blocked by these builders on Bath Road. Please could you let me know if they have been granted permission for this? There are very few parking bays on Bath Road, let alone disabled bays, and this makes life even more difficult for those with limited mobility.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 196, Bath Road, Naunton, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Obstruction by unpermitted skip, scaffolding, building material on pavement

item.title: Other damage to pavement i.e. cobbles, raised mound/surface problem, 26th June

item.title: Roadworks completely blocking pavement on Moorend Park Road. I was forced to go into the Road to get around the obstruction. There was also a large van (visible in photo) parked next to the works which obstructed my view when walking out into the road., 26th June
item.description:
The problem is on the pavement, at the bottom of the old railway bridge on moorend Park Road, next to a tree. The roadworks are to do with building work taking place at a new house, under construction, on the opposite side of the road, more or less directly opposite to the pavement obstruction.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 50, Moorend Park Road, Leckhampton, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Obstruction by unpermitted skip, scaffolding, building material on pavement
